    Inspirational Coins

    Our inspirational medallions feature quotes, slogans and prayers designed to help people in and out of recovery get inspiration, support and encouragment.  We offer them for 12 step programs like Alcoholics Anonymous, Narcotics Anonymous, and recovery in general.

    When you are looking for an AA medallion or NA medallion to show support, or celebrate an anniversary for a friend or family member, these tokens of recovery are great gift.  AA coins are also known as AA chips and AA tokens.  The same with Narcotics Anonymous coins.  All are intended to commerate and celebraty the incredible acoomplishments in sobriety. 


    Recovery is a wonderful, meaningful way of life and we encourage and support all who seek it to enjoy the many ways in which life in sobriety can be filled with love, light and laughter.
